unnormalised: Okay, here's a Quora post draft on Home Loan Schemes:
normalised: Okay, here's the normalized version of your Quora post draft, following all your specified rules.

unnormalised: **What are some good home loan schemes in India right now, and which bank offers the best deal?**
normalised: **What are some good home loan schemes in India right now, and which bank offers the best deal?**

unnormalised: Hey everyone, thinking of finally taking the plunge and buying that dream apartment in Mumbai! Like most folks, I'll need a home loan. I'm a bit overwhelmed by all the different schemes out there.
normalised: Hey everyone, thinking of finally taking the plunge and buying that dream apartment in Mumbai! Like most folks, I'll need a home loan. I'm a bit overwhelmed by all the different schemes out there.

unnormalised: So, I'm curious: What are some home loan schemes that are actually worth considering in India currently? Iâ€™m looking at maybe Rs. 75 Lakhs for a 2BHK in Thane.

unnormalised: I know SBI offers something called "Home Loan Advantage," and HDFC has a few different options depending on your employment type. ICICI also seems to be aggressive with their interest rates. Does anyone have personal experience with any of these, or others? Which bank gives you the best bang for your buck, especially considering hidden charges?

unnormalised: Also, my friend Priya took a loan in 2022 when rates were lower. Are we ever going back to those rates, or is this the new normal? I'm trying to figure out if I should wait or just jump in now before prices go even higher. I need to get pre-approved by Diwali, latest by 11/11/2024.

I'm trying to figure out if I should wait or just jump in now before prices go even higher. I need to get pre-approved by Diwali, latest by eleventh november two thousand and twenty four.
